channel.title: CVE Feed for Noor alam -- Magical Addons For Elementor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Noor alam -- Magical Addons For Elementor

item.title: CVE-2024-38681|2024-08-02T04:19:19.351Z -- noor%20alam -- magical%20addons%20for%20elementor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noor alam Magical Addons For Elementor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Magical Addons For Elementor: from n/a through 1.1.41.
